product_name: SmartWool SportKnit Full-Zip Sweater - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's SmartWool SportKnit Full-Zip Sweater features classic mountain styling perfect for your apres-ski wear. Jersey knit face with terry loop interior combines the comfortable warmth of merino and a hint of stretch that flatters all body types and retains shape wear after wear. Made of soft, nonirritating merino wool, this sweater insulates, wicks away moisture and resists odors-naturally. Center front zipper has logo slider and chin guard. Ruching detail at yoke and rib-knit bottom hem add flattering style. Tubular trim at hand pockets. SmartWool SportKnit sweater is semifitted. Wash garment inside out on cold gentle cycle; dry flat. Closeout.
short_description: The women's SmartWool SportKnit Full-Zip Sweater features classic mountain styling perfect for your apres-ski wear.
